titleStmt.title: The great Duke of Florence A comicall historie. As it hath beene often presented with good allowance by her Maties Servants at the Phœnix in Drurie Lane. Written by Philip Massinger.
titleStmt.author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for John Marriot,

notesStmt.note: Leaf L1 is printed as A1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
